fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka mainnet and BP01 activations successful; network performing well
Blob spam test passed: 15 blob txs across 28 consecutive slots

client_updates.highlight: Prysm v7.0.1 hotfix and v7.1.0 with semi-super node/backfill released
Slower SSDs causing attestation issues post-Fulu due to column sidecar storage
Teku improvements for Fusaka custody and syncing bugs coming soon

glamsterdam_scoping.highlight: Trustless payments kept in ePBS; no security issues found
Exploring non-validating staked builders to address deposit churn concerns
FOCIL: DFI for Glamsterdam, CFI for H-star; headliner process starts January
EIP-7688 (stable containers) CFI'd with CL team support
EIP-8080 and EIP-8061 (churn/weak subjectivity changes) both CFI'd

organizational.highlight: Fusaka retrospective open on Eth Magicians until January
Star name 'Heka' not official; revote proposed for next ACD

action_items.action: Continue EPBS breakout on non-validating staked builders
Advance the new H* star name and portmanteau decision

decisions.decision: Trustless payments stay in ePBS; only revisit for clear security issues
FOCIL DFI'd for Glamsterdam, CFI'd for Heka; January headliner process
EIP-7688 CFI'd; develop to allow removal if complexity issues arise
EIP-8080 and EIP-8061 CFI'd; weak subjectivity parameters tunable

targets.target: January 5th - Heka headliner proposal process begins
Mid-January - ePBS trustless payment spec changes finalized
Next ACDE - Finalize H* star name and portmanteau
